attributes.action: Apply immediate pressure on the government of Burma to immediately release Daw Aung San Suu Kyi from prison.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: And to use all international influence to demand immediate action to support the democratic right of the people of Burma to be represented in government by The National League for Democracy.

rejection.details:
The Government has already responded to the situation in Burma. Please see more details at: 
http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19355
http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19298
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
